alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 11:57AM EDT until June 19 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1245 PM EDT. * At 1157 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Crawfordville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, Carrabelle, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, Shadeville, Royal Bluff, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point and Bald Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
